name: Epic
story_text: Your story tells a tale of the villain's waning power and how the heroes rose to the occasion to stop them.

low.conditions: The target takes a bane on ability rolls (save ends)

mid.conditions: The target has a double bane on ability rolls (save ends)

high.conditions: The target has a double bane on power rolls (save ends)

effect: Choose one ally within distance. While the target is affected by this ability, each time they use an ability, that ally can make a free strike against them after the ability is resolved.
